concept.title: Basic Setup
concept.shortdesc: Setting up the ES-3 for basic control over a singe parameter on a Eurorack module.

conbody.p: A basic setup is all that is needed to control a single parameter with the ES-3.

ol.li: Install the module in a suitable Eurorack case.
Connect a TOSlink optical cable from the ADAT/Optical output of your audio interface to the coresponding input on the ES-3.
Turn on the ES-3 by powering your Eurorack case.

Connect a 1/8' (3.5mm) Eurorack cable from the respective outputs on the ES-3 to any respective input(s) on the Eurorack module(s).!!TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO EQUIPTMENT AND YOUR EARS, BEFORE CONNECTING THE ES-3, TURN THE VOLUME OF YOUR EURORACK MODULE OUTPUT ALL THE WAY DOWN!!The ES-3 can be used to modulate, trigger, or gate any paramater on any Eurorack module. For information on modulation, gates, and triggers, see the Silent Way User Manual or the manual to your Eurorack module.
